plot: When Caillou learns that they've missed Grandpa's birthday, he helps Grandma put together a belated surprise party. After a scary nightmare, Caillou doesn't want to sleep in his own bed anymore and sneaks into Mummy and Daddy's. Caillou's very excited when Dad brings home a computer. While playing dinosaurs in the backyard, Caillou and Leo dig up a fish fossil.—Anonymous
